WFAPI::MapLibSettingsListener

WFAPI::MapLibSettingsListener Class Reference

#include <MapLibSettingsListener.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual ~MapLibSettingsListener ()
virtual void handleUpdatedPOICategories ()=0

Detailed Description

Listener class for receiving updates from MapLib when its settings have been changed, either from server or from cache.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual WFAPI::MapLibSettingsListener::~MapLibSettingsListener (  )  [inline, virtual]

Virtual destructor.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void WFAPI::MapLibSettingsListener::handleUpdatedPOICategories (  )  [pure virtual]

This function will be called when MapLib has updated its settings for the POI categories. For example, categories may have been added or removed. Synchronization with locally stored categories should be done after this function has been called.
